name: Spongebob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom - Rehydrated
summary: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom Rehydrated is an upcoming platform video game based on the Nickelodeon animated series SpongeBob SquarePants. It is a remake of the console versions of Heavy Iron Studios' SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom, in development by Purple Lamp Studios and to be published by THQ Nordic for Microsoft Windows, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One.
info:
• 发行: THQ Nordic
  • 别名: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom – Rehydrated
  • 别名: SpongeBob SquarePants: Battle for Bikini Bottom Rehydrated
  • 别名: 海绵宝宝：争霸比基尼海滩-再注水
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: Platform, action-adventure
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal Engine 4
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2020年6月23日
  • 开发: Purple Lamp Studios
